Title: SharePoint PlayGround
Description:
Usefull controls, webparts and tools to use with SharePoint.
For example : Search Tag Cloud, Netvibes WebPart, Concepts Extractor for Fast, Weather WebPart, WebClipping...
HomeWiki:
SharePoint 2010 Playground

Usefull controls, webparts and tools to use with SharePoint 2010.

Misc WebParts

  • UWA WebPart Generic WebPart that allow Netvibes module to be inserted into SharePoint pages. Sandbox compatible.
  • WebClipping WebPart which allow part of a remote web page to be inserted into SharePoint pages.
  • Weather Web Part which display weather info using Yahoo Weather API
  • My Applications User configurable list of application links, with drag and drop. Sandbox compatible.

Search

  • Tag Cloud Refiner WebPart (part of the Search WebParts download)
  • Treeview Refiner WebPart (part of the Search WebParts download)
  • Pie Refiner WebPart (part of the Search WebParts download)

Search (only for Fast for SharePoint)

  • Concepts Extractor pipeline extensibility stage to extract concepts from documents.

Workflows

  • Calc French Working Days is a sandboxed workflow activity that allows you to get the number of working days between 2 dates. This is usefull for a vacation request workflow.

Tools

  • Deploy XSL Allow customization of the search results page directly from Visual Studio. Just edit files and hit F5 to modify webparts.
